required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability of Dabigatran Etexilate Capsules With and Without Quinidine Sulfate Tablets and to Measure the Effect of Quinidine on the Absorption of Fexofenadine in Healthy Male and Female Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Two-part Study to Determine the Relative Bioavailability of Dabigatran Etexilate 150 mg Bid (Capsules) With and Without 600 mg Quinidine Sulfate Tablets (Part 1) and to Measure the Effect of Quinidine as a Probe Inhibitor of P-glycoprotein on the Absorption of Fexofenadine, a Probe Substrate of P-glycoprotein (Part 2) in Healthy Male and Female Volunteers (an Open-label, Randomised, Two Times Two-way Crossover Study)

brief_summary.textblock:
Part 1: To investigate the effect of quinidine, a P-glycoprotein (P-gp) probe inhibitor on the bioavailability of dabigatran etexilate,
Part 2: To determine the effect of quinidine on the bioavailability of fexofenadine, a probe substrate for P-gp

primary_outcome.measure: AUCτ,ss (area under the concentration-time curve of dabigatran in plasma at steady state over one dosing interval)
Cmax,ss (maximum concentration of dabigatran in plasma at steady state)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Before dose on day 1, day 2, before dose, 0:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 6:00, 8:00, 10:00, 12:00, 24:00 and 48:00 hours after dosing on Day 3

primary_outcome.measure: AUC0-∞ (area under the concentration-time curve of fexofenadine in plasma over the time interval from 0 to infinity)
Cmax (maximum measured concentration of fexofenadine in plasma)

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC0-tz,ss (area under the concentration-time curve of dabigatran in plasma from the time point 0 after the last dose at steady state to the last quantifiable dabigatran plasma concentration within the uniform dosing interval τ)
tz,ss (time of last measurable concentration of dabigatran in plasma within the dosing interval τ at steady state)
tmax,ss (time from last dosing to the maximum concentration of dabigatran in plasma at steady state)
CL/Fss (apparent clearance of dabigatran in the plasma at steady state)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before dose on day 1, day 2, before dose, 0:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 6:00, 8:00, 10:00, 12:00, 24:00 and 48:00 hours after dosing on Day 3

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmin,ss (minimum measured concentration of dabigatran in plasma at steady state)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before dose on day 1, day 2, before dose, 0:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 6:00, 8:00, 10:00, 12:00, 24:00 and 48:00 hours after dosing on Day 3

secondary_outcome.measure: Cavg (average concentration of dabigatran at steady state)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before dose on day 1, day 2, before dose, 0:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 6:00, 8:00, 10:00, 12:00, 24:00 and 48:00 hours after dosing on Day 3

secondary_outcome.measure: C10,2 (total dabigatran concentration 10 hours after the second dabigatran etexilate administration)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 2, 22 hours after the first dose on day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: tmin,ss (time from last dosing to the minimum concentration of dabigatran in plasma at steady state over a uniform dosing interval τ)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before dose on day 1, day 2, before dose, 0:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 6:00, 8:00, 10:00, 12:00, 24:00 and 48:00 hours after dosing on Day 3

secondary_outcome.measure: MRTpo,ss (mean residence time of dabigatran in the body at steady state after oral administration)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before dose on day 1, day 2, before dose, 0:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 6:00, 8:00, 10:00, 12:00, 24:00 and 48:00 hours after dosing on Day 3

secondary_outcome.measure: Vz/Fss (apparent volume of distribution of dabigatran during the terminal phase λz at steady state following an extravascular administration)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before dose on day 1, day 2, before dose, 0:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 6:00, 8:00, 10:00, 12:00, 24:00 and 48:00 hours after dosing on Day 3

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax (maximum measured concentration of quinidine in plasma)
AUC0-∞ (area under the concentration-time curve of quinidine in plasma over the time interval from 0 to infinity)

AUC0-tz (area under the concentration-time curve of fexofenadine in plasma from the time point 0 after the last dose to the last quantifiable analyte plasma concentration within the uniform dosing interval τ)
tmax (time from last dosing to the maximum measured concentration of fexofenadine in plasma)
t½ (terminal half-life of fexofenadine in plasma)
MRTpo (mean residence time of fexofenadine in the body after p.o. administration)
CL/F (apparent clearance of fexofenadine in plasma following extravascular administration)
Vz/F (apparent volume of distribution of fexofenadine during the terminal phase λz following an extravascular dose)
t½ (terminal half-life of dabigatran in plasma at steady state)
Cpre,ss (pre-dose concentration of dabigatran in plasma immediately before administration of the following dose at steady state)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before dose on day 3, day 4, and day 5

arm_group.arm_group_label: Dabigatran etexilate capsules and quinidine sulfate tablets

intervention.arm_group_label: Dabigatran etexilate capsules and quinidine sulfate tablets
Dabigatran etexilate capsules and quinidine sulfate tablets
